methodStep.title: {{Name of the data processing activity}}
methodStep.associatedParty: {{description/reference to the agent(s) associated with the activity}}
methodStep.startTime: {{start datetime of the data processing activity}}
methodStep.endTime: {{end datetime of the data processing activity}}
methodStep.description: {{description of the data processing activity}} {{+optionally any other type of information that needs to be included}}
methodStep.dataSource: {{A reference to the input used in the data processing activity.}}
methodStep.dataResult: {{A description/reference to the output generated in the data processing activity.}}
methodStep.protocol: {{A protocol or SOP that is associated with the activity}}
methodStep.data: {{A reference to the data used in the data processing activity}}
